title: Film Legend Lauren Bacall Will Be Remembered With These Inspiring Quotes
title_page: Film Legend Lauren Bacall Will Be Remembered With These Inspiring Quotes
text:
Sadly, another beloved Hollywood icon has passed away. According to TMZ, film legend Lauren Bacall died Tuesday morning at age 89 of a massive stroke. The Humphrey Bogart Estate confirmed the report on Twitter by saying, "With deep sorrow, yet with great gratitude for her amazing life, we confirm the passing of Lauren Bacall."
The husky-voiced actress, who hit her stride in the Golden Age of Hollywood during her marriage to and her performances with the late Humphrey Bogart, continually impressed audiences with her sultry roles in everything from To Have and Have Not to Key Largo. Outside of the box office, she entranced audiences with her words. Here are some of Bacall's most memorable quotes.
